problem.markdown:
1. Advantages of using Air blast Circuit breakers :
() Current chopping () All (x) Short arc duration () Sensitivity to restricting voltage
2. Potential transformers are carefully designed to ensure
() Minimum variation of voltage ratio with load and minimum phase shift between input and output voltages (x) Maximum variation of voltage ratio with load and minimum phase shift between input and output voltages () Minimum variation of voltage ratio with load and maximum phase shift between input and output voltages () Maximum variation of voltage ratio with load and maximum phase shift between input and output voltages
3. Instrument transformers are classified as:
(x) Both Potential transformer and Current transformer () Potential transformer () None () Current transformer
4. Potential transformers are made with
() High quality icon core operating at very high flex density so that the magnetizing current may be large () Low quality icon core operating at very low flex density so that the magnetizing current may be large () High quality icon core operating at very high flex density so that the magnetizing current may be very small (x) High quality icon core operating at very low flex density so that the magnetizing current may be very small
5. When low inductive current is interrupted by a Circuit breaker and the arc generating force of the Circuit breaker and is more than necessary to interrupt a low magnitude of current, the current will be interrupted before its natural zero instant. It is termed as
() Arcing voltage () Restriking () Recovery instant (x) Current chopping
problem.p: 1. Advantages of using Air blast Circuit breakers :
2. Potential transformers are carefully designed to ensure

choicegroup.choice: Minimum variation of voltage ratio with load and minimum phase shift between input and output voltages
Maximum variation of voltage ratio with load and minimum phase shift between input and output voltages
Minimum variation of voltage ratio with load and maximum phase shift between input and output voltages
Maximum variation of voltage ratio with load and maximum phase shift between input and output voltages
Both Potential transformer and Current transformer
High quality icon core operating at very high flex density so that the magnetizing current may be large
Low quality icon core operating at very low flex density so that the magnetizing current may be large
High quality icon core operating at very high flex density so that the magnetizing current may be very small
High quality icon core operating at very low flex density so that the magnetizing current may be very small
